title: Trump Taps is an explicit climate denial to oversee the Environment Protection Agency's transition team.
subtitle: President-elect Trump Myron Ebel, who is opposed to scientific consensus on anthropogenic global warming, has chosen to lead the Environment Protection Agency's transition team.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President-elect Trump chose a climate change skeptic to chair the team responsible for the Obama-Trap Environment Protection Agencies transition.
